game.name: ISLAND
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Sanzenkai Setsuna awakens on the shore of isolated island Urashima with no memories of his past. Befriending three local girls, Rinne, Karen, and Sara, Setsuna's quest to discover the secrets of Urashima and how they tie into his own past - and future - begins.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sanzenkai Setsuna awakens on the shore of isolated island Urashima with no memories of his past. Befriending three local girls, Rinne, Karen, and Sara, Setsuna's quest to discover the secrets of Urashima and how they tie into his own past - and future - begins.

reviewHighlights.text: 적어도 애니가 얼마나 분량컷을 했는지는 알겠다
